DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluating the safety of a high and low dose of PPM-204 on the electrical pathways of the heart.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Single Doses of PPM-204 on the Electrical Pathways of the Heart
DOC.criteria: Men or women, aged 18 to 55 years Body mass index in the range of 18 to 30 kg/m2 Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12lead ECG History of cardiac, thyroid, muscle, or kidney abnormalities A family history of long QT syndrome and/or sudden cardiac death History of any clinically significant drug allergy, hypersensitivity to sulfonomides or the quinolone class of antibiotics
